description: BACKGROUND AND PURPOSE OF THIS REQUEST FOR INFORMATION THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCE DIRECTORATE OF SOLDIER SYSTEMS PROGRAM MANAGEMENT HAS A REQUIREMENT TO PROCURE NEW EXTREME COLD SLEEPING BAG ACTION TAKEN (AT)
duration_in_months: While the contract regarding the previous bidding process has not been completed, management will still require the goods and will seek to travel when the government has allocated funds to their procurement budget to purchase other desired goods not forthcoming a cover-power conference is intended be to extend option 1 by 99 months
